All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary Exception Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractCalculator
    An abstract calculator implementing the AbstractCalculator.calculate() method as a template method.
    AnnuityCalculator
    The annuity calculator concrete implementation.
    Application
    The Loaning application class defining the main method.
    Calculator
    Exposes a single calculate method.
    Cli
    A Command Line Interface backed by a Scanner.
    CliException
    An exception to be thrown when a CLI general error occurs.
    CliInputs
    Represents the user converted and validated schedule request inputs from the CLI.
    CliInputs.Builder
    A builder to build CliInputs instances.
    CliInputsException
    An exception to be thrown when a conversion or validation error occurs.
    CliUtil
    An utility class with static methods to help reading and writing from/to the CLI.
    Payment
    Represents a periodic payment.
    Payment.Builder
    A builder to build Payment instances.
    Request
    Represents a schedule request.
    Request.Builder
    A builder to build Request instances.
    Schedule
    Represents an amortization schedule.
    Schedule.Builder
    A builder to build Schedule instances.
    ScheduleMethod
    The enumeration of Schedule calculation methods providing a fabric method.
    StraightLineCalculator
    The straight-line calculator concrete implementation.
